meanings.definition: Treating people equally and without favoritism
meanings.sent1: The fairer judge ensured that every person in the courtroom received a fair trial.
meanings.sent2: It's important to have fairer rules that apply to everyone in the game.
meanings.sent3: The fairer teacher always listened to each student's opinion with care.
meanings.sent4: In her fairer approach, she made sure no one felt left out.
meanings.sent5: The fairer treatment of all employees led to a harmonious work environment.

meanings.definition: In a more just or impartial manner
meanings.sent1: The judge presided over the case fairer than anyone had expected.
meanings.sent2: She distributed the candies fairer among the children to avoid any arguments.
meanings.sent3: The siblings decided to share the cake fairer by cutting it into equal pieces.
meanings.sent4: He played the game fairer than anyone else, always following the rules.
